sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getCategoryEditorsRefQual</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>getCategoryEditorsRefQual</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function getCategoryEditorsRefQual() {
	if (current[current.department_or_group].nil())
		return 'active=true';
	
	if (gs.getProperty("glide.service_creator.restrict_editors") != "true")
		return 'active=true';
	
	if (current.department_or_group == 'department')
		return 'active=true^department=' + current.department;
	
	// it's for a group
	var members = GlideUserGroup.getMembers(current.group);
	var memberArr = [];
	while (members.next()) {
		if (members.user.active == true)
			memberArr.push(members.user.toString());
	}
	if (memberArr.length == 0)
		return 'active=true';

	return 'sys_idIN' + memberArr;
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-06-26 17:45:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2f3a56215f212100a9ad2572f2b47775</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getCategoryEditorsRefQual</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Creator" source="com.glide.service_creator">bbb141436d6620100acb70b3534330b7</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2f3a56215f212100a9ad2572f2b47775</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-06-26 18:00:44</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>615</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
